products.name: White Castle Sliders Classic Cheese - 6 ct

extendedInfo.detail: 6 sliders (3 - two packs). Sliders with grilled onions on our signature bun.  This product contains a bioengineered food ingredient.  Easy to heat. Fun to heat. Fully cooked. Craveable. Flavorful. Irreplaceable. Just one slice of melty American cheese is all it takes to give this mouthwatering crave instant classic status. It's the one we all love. The icon. The fan favorite. The flavor that checks every box. From the 100% beef patty and savory grilled onions to a luscious layer of cheese and our signature bun, these Classic Cheese Sliders go all-in on What You Crave. Turn your home into a Castle. There's a Slider for every Crave. You in? (hashtag)longlivesliders. Our Sliders. Your Castle. Show us on the socials (at)whitecastle.  For questions or comments about this product, contact us at whitecastle.com/contact-us or write to us at White Castle Food Products, LLC, Attn: Customer Feedback, 555 Edgar Waldo Way, Columbus, OH 43215 and attach the production code number above. There's more than one way to satisfy your crave! Check out our recipe ideas to switch up your slider game. Go to whitecastle.com/recipes.  Recyclable where recycling facilities exist.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Bun: Enriched Bleached Wheat Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Water, Sugar, Soybean Oil, Contains 2% Or Less: Yeast, Salt, Vital Wheat Gluten, Mono-and Diglycerides, Corn Starch, Calcium Stearoyl Lactylate (CSL), Oat Fiber, Corn Syrup Solids, Guar Gum, Sodium Alginate, Monocalcium Phosphate, Enzymes, Xanthan Gum, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Hamburger: Beef, Sharp Pasteurized Process American Cheese: Pasteurized Milk, Water, Cream, Milkfat, Sodium Citrate, Salt, Sodium Phosphate, Cheese Cultures, Sorbic Acid (Preservative), Lactic Acid, Color Added, Enzymes, Acetic Acid, Citric Acid, Soy Lecithin, Sunflower Lecithin (Anti-Sticking Agent), Water, Dried Onions, Salt, Pepper.
extendedInfo.directions: Heating your perfect sliders for that fresh from the castle taste, cook from thawed. From thawed: 1. Fully thaw in a refrigerator for the best tasting sliders. Do not refreeze. If thawed, refrigerate for 10 days max. 2. Remove sliders from plastic wrapper. 3. Place sliders on a microwave-safe plate, with the bottom buns up, wrapped in a food grade paper towel with the open ends tucked under the top bun. 4. Microwave on a 'high' setting for 25 seconds. 5. Turn sliders over and microwave for 20 more seconds on a 'high' setting. 6. Cool sliders in the microwave for 1 min and enjoy. We get it. You want your sliders now! From frozen: 1. Remove sliders from plastic wrapper. 2. Place sliders on a microwave-safe plate, with the bottom buns up, wrapped in a food grade paper towel with the open ends tucked under the top bun. 3. Microwave on a 'high' setting (based on 1200w microwave. Microwaves vary - adjust times accordingly to heat product. For food safety, heat to a minimum internal temperature of 165 degrees F. For additional heating methods) for 40 seconds. 4. Turn sliders over and microwave for 40 more seconds on a 'high' setting (based on 1200w microwave. Microwaves vary - adjust times accordingly to heat product. For food safety, heat to a minimum internal temperature of 165 degrees F. For additional heating methods). 5. Cool sliders in the microwave for 1 minute and enjoy! Caution - product may be hot.  Keep frozen.  Pull tab to unleash the crave!
extendedInfo.warnings: Contains: milk, soy, sesame, wheat.Warning: Consuming this product can expose you to furfuryl alcohol, which is known to California to cause cancer. Go to www.p65warnings.ca.gov/food.
